channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There is a simple fix for America’s job-quality crisis: actually give workers a piece of the business
item.description: My dad spent 40 years operating heavy machinery. He was proud of his work but he didn’t feel respected. Today, I see those same tensions are still wit...

item.title: Canada’s Northwest Territories Diamond Mines Are Closing
item.description: After decades of growth driven by diamond mining, Canada’s Northwest Territories are facing the closure of three major mines and wondering: What’s nex...

item.title: When David Ellison was 13, his billionaire father Larry bought him a plane. He competed in air shows before leaving it to become a Hollywood executive
item.description: Ellison, 42, revived “Top Gun”—and now he’s taking the fight to Netflix.

item.title: Judge Says Ghislaine Maxwell Grand Jury Records Can Be Unsealed, Citing New Epstein Law

item.title: China’s Access to Powerful Nvidia Chips Comes at ‘Critical Moment’
item.description: President Trump said Nvidia can export some chips. But years of U.S. restrictions have propelled China to make everything it needs for advanced A.I.

item.title: Judge Suggests Lindsey Halligan, Prosecutor on Comey and James Cases, Should Resign
item.description: Lindsey Halligan’s indictments against James B. Comey, the former F.B.I. director, and Letitia James, the attorney general of New York, were dismissed...

item.title: The low-hire, low-fire economy crawls along with job openings unchanged from September to October
item.description: Job openings have come down steadily since peaking at a record 12.1 million in March 2022. They were 7.7 million for both of the last two months.

item.title: Why Some Teenagers Are Against Australia’s Social Media Ban
item.description: Australia has imposed one of the world’s most comprehensive measures banning social media for children under 16. This is what several young Australian...

item.title: Lithuania Declares National Emergency Over Suspicious Balloons From Belarus
item.description: Hundreds of weather balloons sent to Lithuania this year have disrupted flights and stirred alarm in a sabotage campaign against a NATO state.

item.title: Top 10 Video Games of 2025
item.description: Autobiographical stories and mystery games resonated in a chaotic year.

item.title: Deutsche Bank and Jeffrey Epstein’s ghost
item.description: Given its long history of servicing high-risk clients, it is perhaps unsurprising that Deutsche Bank stepped in when Epstein was ditched by JPMorgan.
